participant_1.background:
My favorite animal is a dog, but I've been with my lizard Gila for the longest time.
I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers.
i have trouble feeling emotion.
i sell miscellaneous stuff in local fairs.
I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.

participant_2.background:
I collect rare and unusual medical oddities to help me feel better about my own health.
I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp.
my family gets together every saturday.
i am always looking for wildlife when i am outside.
I earn money from my farm and YouTube channel.

content.text: What is something interesting about you?
I like to collect rare and unusual medical oddities.
That sounds neat! Do you have any interesting stories?
I have a few, but one of my favorites is about this time I found a real human skull at a yard sale.
Wow! That's crazy! What did you do with it?
I ended up keeping it as a souvenir.
I'm not sure if I'd be able to do that! I'm pretty squeamish when it comes to medical stuff.
I guess I'm just used to it. I work on a farm, so I'm always around animals and their body parts.
I can definitely see how that would desensitize you.
I have a lizard named Gila!
That's a cool name! I've never heard of a lizard named Gila before.
Thanks! It's a Navajo word that means "spider".
That's really interesting. I love learning about new cultures.
Me too! I'm always looking for ways to expand my horizons.
